pullrequest.title: Ensure private dependencies are encoded in pkgconfig as Requires.private

content.raw:
I tested this by looking at the .pc generated and I see that the private libs are now placed correctly in `Requires.private`. 

The changes look fine but I’m not very familiar with ign-cmake so it would be nice to have @{557058:67759e29-d1df-465f-868d-047738e36fc9} take one final look at the changes..
content.html:
I tested this by looking at the .pc generated and I see that the private libs are now placed correctly in Requires.private.

The changes look fine but I’m not very familiar with ign-cmake so it would be nice to have @Michael Grey take one final look at the changes..
